message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your offer. I'm willing to come down to $9000, which is still a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $9500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
